subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The general director of the Rabobank cycling team resigned yesterday, 10 days after he dismissed Michael Rasmussen from the squad while he was leading the Tour de France. The director, Theo de Rooij, has “decided to step down, in consultation with Rabobank,” the team said in a statement. De Rooij dismissed Rasmussen, a Danish rider, saying he lied about his whereabouts to evade doping tests.
